article_node.title: Iran to hold call with European nations over nuclear program as sanctions deadline draws closer
article_node.summary: Iran's Foreign Minister is set to hold a conference call with European counterparts to discuss the potential reimposition of UN sanctions over its nuclear program, amid rising tensions following recent military actions by Israel and the U.S. The situation is complicated by Iran's cessation of cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency and threats against its director-general. Meanwhile, U.S. President Trump is actively seeking a ceasefire in the ongoing conflict between Israel and Hamas, while also addressing concerns about Iran's nuclear capabilities and the implications of recent U.S. airstrikes on Iranian sites.
